title: Jidao Long Shen
synopsis:
Legend has it that the Dragon God is sitting in the realm of the gods, and if he is the inheritor of the gods, he will become the new ruler of China. The various sects and gangs are gradually fighting over the inheritance of the Dragon God. The protagonist, Chu Qianye, was regarded as the son of a sinner because of his father's loss of the treasure of the sect. A subtle connection was made.

(Source: Youku, translated)
